name: homiee-monorepo
description: Homiee platform - Find your place in the city

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist

author: Homiee Team
